epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
title: Implement multi-factor authentication for customer login
description: As a customer, I want to use multi-factor authentication for login, so that my account is more secure.
attributes_and_rules: The system must support OTPs, mobile authenticators, and biometrics.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers must authenticate using two or more factors. 2. Authentication options include OTPs, mobile authenticators, and biometrics.
test_cases: Given a user account, when the user attempts to log in, then they must complete multi-factor authentication using their chosen methods.

title: Design a responsive user interface for all devices
description: As a customer, I want to use the self-service portal on any device, so that I have a consistent experience.
attributes_and_rules: The UI must be optimized for desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The UI must adapt to different screen sizes and orientations. 2. Navigation must be intuitive on all devices.
test_cases: Given access to the portal, when a customer views the UI on different devices, then the layout must be responsive and navigation intuitive.

title: Develop a personalized dashboard based on user profile
description: As a customer, I want a dashboard displaying relevant financial details, so that I can manage my accounts efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must display account summaries, available services, and personalized offers.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard must adapt to the user profile. 2. It must display real-time updates.
test_cases: Given a user profile, when the user accesses the dashboard, then it must show relevant financial details, services, and offers.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Design digital workflows for account opening and modification
description: As a customer, I want to open accounts and modify services digitally, so that I can conveniently manage my banking needs.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows must include guided forms, automatic validation, and digital signatures.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Workflows must guide users step-by-step. 2. Forms must be automatically validated.
test_cases: Given a need to open an account, when the user follows the workflow, then the system must guide through steps and validate data.

epic_title: Save and Resume Functionality for Incomplete Applications
title: Allow customers to save and resume incomplete forms
description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later without losing progress.
attributes_and_rules: Data must be securely encrypted and autosaved periodically.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Incomplete applications must be saved securely. 2. Users must resume from the point they paused.
test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user decides to resume, then the system must load saved data and allow continuation.

title: Implement secure document upload for verification
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely, so that my sensitive information is protected.
attributes_and_rules: Documents must be encrypted in transit and at rest.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Document uploads must be secure. 2. The system must validate file formats.
test_cases: Given the need to upload a document, when the user performs an upload, then the document must be securely encrypted and validated.

title: Provide real-time tracking and notifications for requests
description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I am informed about their status.
attributes_and_rules: The system must provide visual timelines and send notifications via email/SMS.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users must view request statuses in real-time. 2. Notifications must be sent at key milestones.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, when the request status changes, then the user must receive notifications and view updates in real-time.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Maintain secure records of user activities and requests
description: As a customer, I want a history of my interactions, so that I can track my activities and maintain accountability.
attributes_and_rules: All interactions must be recorded securely with immutable logs.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User activities must be logged. 2. Customers must view their interaction history.
test_cases: Given a user interacting with the portal, when they perform actions, then the system must record these and provide an accessible history.
